description:
It was in April when cherry blossoms bloomed.
Most of the cliques in the class have been established.
Otako passes papers behind her when she notices Galko sleeping on her desk.
Otako’s first impression of Galko was ”she must be a really dumb gyaru...”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est vrai que ça existe, les amies pour la vie ?
Is It True You`re Friends Forever?
一生の友達って本当ですか?
